alert.note: Alert for Attala; Choctaw; Kemper; Lauderdale; Leake; Neshoba; Newton; Noxubee; Scott; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 3:43AM CDT until March 12 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Leake County in central Mississippi... Southern Noxubee County in east central Mississippi... Northern Newton County in east central Mississippi... Kemper County in east central Mississippi... East central Attala County in central Mississippi... Winston County in east central Mississippi... Northern Scott County in central Mississippi... Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 343 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Stallo to near Edinburg to near Ludlow, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Dowdville, Stallo and Madden around 350 AM CDT. Philadelphia, Pearl River and Dixon around 355 AM CDT. Nanih Waiya and Steele around 400 AM CDT. Prospect and Neshoba around 405 AM CDT. Preston, House, Bethsaida, Conehatta, Gholson and Bluff Springs around 410 AM CDT. Herbert Springs and Stratton around 415 AM CDT. Decatur, De Kalb, Damascus, Martin and Little Rock around 420 AM CDT. Liberty and Prismatic around 425 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Noxapater, Tucker, Walnut Grove, Sebastopol, Standing Pine, Scooba, Lena, Shuqualak and Chunky. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Choctaw; Kemper; Lauderdale; Leake; Neshoba; Newton; Noxubee; Scott; Winston
